title: President confers Nishan-e-Imtiaz (M) on new air chief
content:
ISLAMABAD, Mar 22 (APP):President Dr Arif Alvi Monday confered Nishan-e-Imtiaz (M) on Chief of Air Staff Air Chief Marshal Zaheer Ahmad Baber at a special investiture ceremony held here at the Aiwan-e-Sadr.
He decorated the new air chief with the prestigious award in recognition to his services for the country.
The ceremony was attended by senior officials of the government and armed forces.
